summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the south 140' of the north 345' of the west 180' of the east 510' of the NE 1/4 of the SW 1/4 of Section 31-26-4, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-426 and 17-311 respectively.
